attributes.action: Stop the consumption of alcohol in the Palace of Westminster.
attributes.additional_details: In many professions it use to be the norm to have subsidised bars that were available for staff whilst on and off duty. This is no longer the case almost everywhere. If politicians or staff need to drink on duty or after work then do what the electorate do and go to a pub and use their own money.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament and those who sit in the House of Lords, along with all other staff, should not be permitted to consume alcohol at their place of work, especially subsidised by tax payers.
